resources.string: How this app works is simple: \nThis is a prank Cool or Nerd app, it is the perfect app for pranking your friends and family.\n1. Just take a pic, if you will click on the camera button for cool result or anywhere else for nerd results.
*note, by clicking on continue you will never see these instructions again.
Just take a pic and the app will analyze the image and detect it you Cool or Nerd.
